Who We AreHaboobe Comunications is a full-service digital marketing agency dedicated to helping businesses stay relevant in an ever-changing business landscape.  We educate our clients about the latest strategies while taking the necessary time to research, design, and implement a highly effective plan to promote each business’s unique brand across the worldwide web.What We DoWe pride ourselves on delivering integrated marketing and optimization solutions to build your brand and increase meaningful engagement with your customers.How We Do ItFirst, we plan.  We learn what people are saying about you and your products, and your competitors, and how you are currently responding to them.  We then identify new opportunities for you to communicate with your market.Then we create.  We design compelling, creative brand experiences across all communication channels of the digital spectrum – whether it’s search, social marketing, or interactive design – while maintaining your brand identity.And finally, we engage.  These experiences reach your potential customers on every level since they are inspired by an intuitive and well-researched grasp of your consumer’s needs.  This, in turn, creates an irresistible appeal that will move people to take action.Working with Habooble Communications* Increase your revenue per client, per product, per service with minimal additional effort required* Expand the services you offer to your customers or clients and deliver additional value added solutions to them* We can integrate our work seamlessly with your new or existing websites, blogs, shopping carts or social media presence.* Our ROI-focused approach ensures that you will generate a return on any investment

Launched 501(c)(3) Foundation aimed at creating a Web 2.0 international network to aid those suffering grief as a result of a loss.  Designed and deployed 13 site network of niche bereavement sites, internet radio program (5 years) and overall strategy.  Current traffic run rate in excess of 2 million per year.  Set up Google AdWords Non-Profit account for Google display advertising.

Developed web presence for Internet-only streaming talk radio company, and ad delivery company (patented), developed all pricing/cost structures, setup up of all accounting, financial systems.  All facets of business plan development.  Hired and trained sales force of 10.  All liaison with potential investors.  Executive Produced Internet radio talk programs, including one of my own “NetStrategies”; learned all technical aspects of running a streaming Internet radio station from stream configuration to engineering of shows.  Assisted in the completion of a Reverse Take Over resulting in a publicly traded company providing liquidity for original investors (MDVX: OB -- currently trading as AUGT.OB)

Original hire of this pro-environment recycling company.  CTN became one of the largest independent manufacturers of recyclable toner, ink and optical photoconductor cartridges for laser and inkjet printers, copiers and fax machines in the United States.  CTN grew to over 120 corporate employees in three manufacturing and sales locations (including one inside a federal prison in a joint venture with the U.S. Department of Justice’s Federal Prison Industries, Inc. which employed over 200 inmates).During my tenure Annual Revenue rose to $13 million.In the course of building this business my responsibilities and experience included:  personally manufacturing product and product research and development; designing Deming based quality control systems and processes in both manufacturing, operations, and customer satisfaction; venture capital sourcing and fundraising; contract proposal development, award, management and fulfillment; financial analysis and due diligence of acquisition targets; product selection, costing, vendor management, and pricing structures; design and implementation of management information systems for accounting, customer satisfaction, and sales (CRM); sales management of 10 person outside sales team, as well as 21 inside telesales professionals; marketing development, i.e. copywriting, layout, production, delivery; and individual sales and customer relations efforts.Extensive experience selling to federal, state and local governments, as well as corporate vertical and horizontal markets ranging from home-based businesses to real estate agencies to Fortune 500 companies.  Experienced in establishing and managing Association and Non-Profit “affinity” marketing pull-through programs.

There are a lot of people who tell you they know how to get the Internet to work for you in that magical way so your stuff gets found and seen and the phone rings off the hook with offers and sales. But not many of them can really actually DO it.Chris Conlan is one of the few Internet master maestros I have worked with who can really DELIVER it. He really is a kind of super tech uber-genius who knows how to balance idealism, capitalism, and return on investment for his clients. He is the wiz guy I go to when I really need something to be done right. And I can always trust him that it will get done right and the client will be more than satisfied with the final result. Plus, he always has several options on how to create the magic you are looking for that will make it all work.He is also my favorite friend to run down all the latest geeky new Internet developments so I can keep up with what’s constantly changing out there in the worlds of media and technology. The breadth of his tech knowledge is so huge a lot of the time I can’t even keep up and I learn from him. Aside from all his professional skill sets, what I value most is his loyalty. Chris is very pro-active and thrives on contributing to whatever you need, and always goes more than the distance you ask him to go.It’s also really nice to work with somebody who cares more about his son than his pocketbook. I consider him a great friend, and more than just a collaborator. But if you hire him, you better be ready to rock and roll!

SRoya Rose
Owner, TheGoddessGuru.com
July 7, 2011, SRoya was a client of Christopher’s

It was in the September of last year that I was first recommended to Christopher Conlan, introduced to me as the IT guru, through Randall Libero, from Voice America fame. Chris is well known for taking many companies Internet and social media networking presence to amazing heights with a brilliant track record of simple and effective SEO options and strategies.  Now at first I knew nothing about such things as SEO (Search Engine Optimizations) but with lots of patience and some enthusiastic helpful coaching from Christopher I managed to come to grips with a whole new IT language, embracing marketing concepts, that I’m happy to report work a treat. True to his name and IT fame, Christopher is an expert at all things related to setting yourself up for maximisation on the Internet. He is fast and efficient with a quirky sense of humour, making me laugh at myself and the Internet at large on a regular basis, putting me at ease. With his broad knowledge, wonderful attitude and happy disposition, Christopher made my journey into the techno side of my business and the world of social media cyber space, simple. I still engage Christopher's skills as a contractor and am enjoying the outcomes he has helped deliver to my business so far.  A true professional and real team player, uplifting, patient and friendly, he listened to what my business needs really were, gently guiding me to understand a whole new world of possibilities and options with relative ease, which, I must say was no mean feat, let me tell you....  I’m so grateful for our business connection, as I love knowing that I have someone I trust to takes care of my IT end of things and who doesn’t charge unreasonable rates. I highly recommend Christopher as an IT expert to anyone who needs a professional, to help grow their Internet and social media presence. I’m currently enjoying constant growth in my social media SEO aspect of my businesses with regular ongoing support. I can now move forward confidently while Chris and I are happy working together strategizing for the rest of my business growth requirements. He has definitely made something I thought was going to be a chore, into a revelation and real delightful part of my success. Thanks Chris. S’Roya Rose http://www.thegoddessguru.com

I have known Chris for many many years, however this is the first time that we have truly worked together.  It is always a tough decision to go to work with friends and my reservations proved to be very misguided as Chris was able to show us results EVEN BEFORE WE HIRED HIM.  That is what sets Chris apart from the myriad of competitors he may have.....he studies, researches and gets to know his clients and THEIR needs.  His genuine discipline and knowledge make him an expert in his craft, and I know he will continue to be a significant problem solver who will help create value and results for anyone working with him.

Ryan Treasure
VP of Broadcast Operations
October 18, 2017, Ryan worked with Christopher in the same group

I've worked with Ryan for probably about 10 years.  Ryan is the definitive technology project manager.  He's a master of running multiple teams on multiple projects, deploying new technologies which benefit the overall at the individual level and masterminding ways to cut costs, improve deliverability, maximizing efficiency and still managing to keep his sanity when all else around him is falling apart!  Ryan is an excellent identifier of new skills and snippets that improve a product being at the top of the market.  He's a negotiator that get's BETA pricing after the fact, and most importantly, he doesn't make a lot of mistakes.  In fact, I can't think of one off hand!  Ryan is a solid, grounded family man, with a Navy background of disciplined thinking and processes that gets tasks done on time, under budget and usually beyond expectation.    I could not recommend him more as a guy that gets things done, or as someone with impeccable personal character.

March 31, 2016, Christopher worked with John W. but at different companies

I can't say enough good things about Dr. John Horn.  Not only did the man write the Bible on MySQL but he's an excellent teacher.  I cut my teeth on LAMP with AXIS Open Source's training and learned even more just by being fortunate enough to worth with John on a variety of projects.   But beyond his incredible ability to see things in code, his abilities to take complex problems and simplify them into fast moving systems, and his insight in to consumer behavior is his personal character.   If you've known John for any period of time you quickly come to realize this is a man who gives of himself and his time to help others.  He is incredibly patient and generous.  He's the real deal.  If you're lucky enough to do business with him, leap at the opportunity.

summary: Nothing makes me happier to the solve a problem.  Well maybe creating problems, and then solving them! I have great business partners, a normally dysfunctional family, Shadow the Dog and great clients.My company Habooble Communications solves problems.  We're focused on the problem of a phone that doesn't ring, cash that doesn't register and how many licks does it take to get to the center of the Tootsie Pop that is your income statement.We measure success not in terms of clicks or clients, but on realized revenue.   Cash in the door.  We use all of the possible cost effective tactics we can dream up, maximize your spend against revenues.  You might already have a company handling your website or marketing strategy.  Wonderful.  You can still join our email list or get a FREE membership to the education center we're building.   Don't hesitate to contact us for a free evaluation of how to fill in the blanks, leverage your assets and increase revenues.If you are interested in becoming a partner or have something interesting for us to throw into the joint venture grinder hit us up at http://habooble.com/joint-venture/
